net.oauth.signature.pem
Class PEMReader

java.lang.Object
  net.oauth.signature.pem.PEMReader

public class PEMReader
extends java.lang.Object

This class convert PEM into byte array. The begin marker is saved and it can be used to determine the type of the PEM file.
